Package utils

Class UnitConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.UnitConverter
  • public class UnitConverter
extends Object
    Utility class for converting units from one Coordinate System to another. The first being the awt-based coordinate system and the second being the JBox2D one. awt uses the top left corner as the origin, while JBox2D uses the bottom left corner.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnitConverter

        public UnitConverter​(Dimension cs1,
                     org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 cs2)
        Constructs a new UnitConverter.
        Parameters:
        cs1 - The first Coordinate System (awt-based Dimension).
        cs2 - The second Coordinate System (JBox2D's Vec2). Both Coordinate Systems should represent the maximum area available on the x and y axis.

        public Point meterToPixel​(org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 position)
        Convert a Vec2 of org.jbox2d to Point from java.awt.
        Parameters:
        position - The Vec2 position to convert.
        Returns:
        The converted position as a Point.

      • pixelToMeter

        public org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 pixelToMeter​(Point position)
        Convert a Point from java.awt to a Vec2 of org.jbox2d.

        The converted position as a Vec2.
